name: Blessed Health
description: Become immune to all negative effects (debuffs), except cooldown-related effects.

name: Companion's Calling
description: +1 rank to all Companion skills.

name: Eternal Servitude
description: When a companion dies, their Use effect cooldown is reset and no longer require any Mana or other resources to be cast for the next 5 seconds.

name: Life Bond
description: Player Maximum Health is added to Companion base health.

name: Crystalized Life
description: +AMOUNT Health.

name: Entity's Inclination
description: Satellites apply a Weaken effect to foes hit, increasing the damage they take by AMOUNT%. This effect stacks infinitely.

name: Time Unwound
description: Damage over time effects deal AMOUNT% increased damage, but have 30% less duration.

name: Myggen's Fang
description: +AMOUNT% increased Health on Hit and Mana on Hit. Restore twice as much when landing a Critical Hit.

name: Companion's Favor
description: +AMOUNT% to Companion Passive and Use Effect.

name: Rose Eternal
description: +AMOUNT Thorns.

name: Ancient Focus
description: Indirect Damage Enchants are AMOUNT% stronger.

name: Conviction's Balance
description: +AMOUNT% Holy Damage and Shadow Damage.

name: Havoc
description: Continously break all breakable objects within AMOUNT meters.

name: Shield Adornment
description: +AMOUNT% to the maximum cap of Block Chance and Damage Blocked.

name: Elementalist's Boon
description: Adds AMOUNT% of Damage Vs. Elemental stat to all Damage Element stat, but no longer deal bonus damage to Elemental foes.

name: Astral Power
description: +AMOUNT% Satellite Damage.

name: Ritual Stone
description: +1 rank to all Ritual skills.

name: The Twins
description: Health and Mana pickups always drop in pairs.

name: Megan's Spark
description: For each unspent skillpoint, all Minor stats are increased by AMOUNT%.

name: Death's Decay
description: All enemies within 5 meters are slowed by AMOUNT%.

name: Battle Lust
description: Killstreaks last AMOUNT% longer.

name: Essence of Burning Rage
description: +AMOUNT Maximum Rage and Minimum Rage.

name: Imbiber's Stone
description: Health Potions and Mana Potions have a AMOUNT% chance to critically hit, restoring double the amount.

name: Focused Knowledge
description: The base passive node in each skill tree is now AMOUNTx as strong. Does not affect Mastery base nodes.

name: Nature's Decree
description: +AMOUNT% Fire Damage and Lightning Damage.

name: Magnetic Device
description: +AMOUNT% Pickup Radius.

name: Ancient Retort
description: When hurt, Weaken the attacking foe, increasing the damage it suffers by AMOUNT%. Stacks infinitely.

name: Grip of Death
description: Adds a 25% chance on hit to pull the foe towards the player. Foes pulled are Weakened, suffering AMOUNT% increased damage taken for 7 seconds.

name: Force of Will
description: +AMOUNT% Physical Damage.

name: Battle Glory
description: Killstreak bonus attacks now match the player's strongest Damage Element and are improved in every aspect.

name: Element of Surprise
description: Companions gain the Invisibility affix, and have their damage stat increased by AMOUNT% on any attacks made from Invisibility.

name: Red Wail
description: Triggering a Bleed effect has a AMOUNT% chance to summon a Wailing Ghost which will strike up to 3 foes for the Bleed effect's damage tick.

name: Symbol of Hope
description: +1 rank to all Aura skills.

name: Gladiator's Allure
description: Experience gained from Killstreaks is increased by AMOUNT%.

name: Rahlence's Resurrection
description: On-kill enchants and powers have a AMOUNT% chance to be triggered on hit. Does not affect any passive skills, or any effects using a foe's health as damage.

name: Battle Haze
description: -25% Attack Speed, +25% Movement Speed, +10% Evasion.

name: Ancient Bead
description: +1 rank to all Heritage skills.

name: Attrition's Yield
description: +AMOUNT% Poison Damage and Frost Damage.

name: Crystalized Mana
description: +AMOUNT Mana.

name: Aphrodite's Cue
description: The delay between staggered damage ticks is increased by AMOUNT% of the Willpower stat. Meaning the damage is dealt at slower intervals and held onto longer.

name: Tales of Victory
description: Crowned foes count as AMOUNT foes for Killstreaks.

name: Finder's Keep
description: All chests and secrets are now marked and revealed on the map when entering any zone.

name: Soul Gem
description: +1 Maximum Souls.
